content:
I am a B.Tech student at the Department of Applied Mathematics, Delhi Technological University, India. My current work is focused on classification of protein structures. I have been interested in computer vision problems and have been trying to learn more about them. These days I have also been taking part in kaggle competitions as a means to widen my knowledge of machine learning and picking up nifty tricks.
In my free time I watch football and I’m a huge Barcelona supporter. In the premier league, I support Liverpool and usually my weekends are reserved for watching matches(unless there is an international break). Also I like landscape photography and listen to alot of indie music.
summary:

These days I have also been taking part in kaggle competitions as a means to widen my knowledge of machine learning and picking up nifty tricks.
In my free time I watch football and I’m a huge Barcelona supporter.
title: Vaibhav Kumar

summary: Converts eye blinks into morse code and then switches between youtube videos according to the pattern entered
title: Dots and Dash

summary: A Movie Recommender System which uses collaborative filtering techniques and matrix factorization to recommend movies to the user
title: Movie Recommender System

summary: Used 2 CNN-based models with custom loss functions for feature extraction and a RGBT for classification into genuine and forged signatures
title: Writer Independent Offline Signature Recognition Using Ensemble Learning
